The 2022 range of Samsung Neo QLED televisions will include a Gaming Hub that supports cloud streaming and NFTs.
Cloud game libraries from Stadia, GeForce Now and Utomik will be featured, with "more to come". Games can be played simply by pairing a compatible controller.
Read more
articles.title: New Samsung TVs will include cloud gaming and NFT support

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Mass Effect: Legendary Edition is among the games coming to Xbox Game Pass this month.
The sci-fi trilogy remaster will hit the service on console and PC (via EA Play) on 6th January, including all three games and DLC.
Read more
articles.title: Mass Effect: Legendary Edition leads January Xbox Game Pass additions

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Paul "Rushy" Rustchynsky tweeted to say the project will be announced this year and will come from the new Avalanche studio in Liverpool that opened last year.
Read more
articles.title: Driveclub director's next game won't be a racer

articles.author: Tom Phillips
articles.description:
Bloomberg has reported that, after nearly eight years of development, the next project from BioShock creator Ken Levine is in development hell.
The report is based on interviews with several of Levine's former colleagues at Ghost Story Games, the small studio set up by Levine following the launch of BioShock Infinite and his decision to subsequently shutter former studio Irrational Games.
Read more
articles.title: Former team members criticise BioShock creator Ken Levine's inability to actually release a game

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Square Enix president Yosuke Matsuda has published a letter in which he expresses hope that NFTs and blockchain technology will become a "major trend" in gaming.
In a New Year's letter, Matsuda expressed what he believes will be major areas of growth for the industry in 2022, including cloud gaming, AI, and blockchain games.
Read more
articles.title: Square Enix president believes NFTs and blockchain tech will be a "major trend" this year

articles.author: Tom Phillips
articles.description:
Fresh details have come to light of the once-planned sequel to Bully, Rockstar's brilliant schoolyard sim, as part of a new Game Informer report.
Bully 2 would have featured a vastly-expanded playable world three times the size of the original game, where every building could have been entered (legally or via forced entry). 
Read more
articles.title: Report details Rockstar's axed plans for Bully 2

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
The next big reveal for Final Fantasy 16 will be in the spring, following delays due to COVID-19.
Producer Naoki Yoshida, who's also been busy with the recently released Endwalker expansion for Final Fantasy 14, wrote an update on the game's website explaining it's been delayed by almost half a year.
Read more
articles.title: Final Fantasy 16 news is due this spring

articles.author: Tom Phillips
articles.description:
League of Legends maker Riot Games has agreed a $100m (£74m) settlement to finally end its long-running gender discrimination lawsuit.
The settlement, announced at the end of December, brings to a close the class action suit filed by employees back in 2018. 
Read more
articles.title: Riot Games agrees $100m gender discrimination settlement

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Hello! Over the next few days we're going to be going back over some of our favourite games and moments and themes and whatnot from this very strange year. We hope you enjoy looking back with us!
It started with a reveal that had the internet thirsting; it ended with voice actress Maggie Robertson winning best performance at The Game Awards. 2021 was the year of Lady Dimitrescu.
Read more
articles.title: 2021 in review: Lady Dimitrescu: Icon of the year

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
The statement was released on the Treyarch Twitter account earlier this week.
Read more
articles.title: Women of Treyarch say inclusive working environment is "our highest priority"

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
The Steam Winter Sale is now live until 5th January 2022.
Yes it's that time of year to go trawling through your wishlist to grab any discounted games and add to your 2021 backlog.
Read more
articles.title: The Steam Winter Sale is now live

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Weird West, the new Devolver Digital-published game from Arkane Studios co-founder Raphaël Colantonio, has been delayed until 31st March 2022.
Due out on PC, Xbox and PlayStation, it was originally given a January release date but that's been delayed to iron out remaining issues.
Read more
articles.title: Weird West delayed into March 2022

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Void Interactive has lost the publisher for its SWAT game Ready or Not days after comments suggested it would include a school shooting mission.
The game was released in early access on 17th December, but in a statement on Twitter Void Interactive said it had parted ways with publisher Team17.
Read more
articles.title: SWAT game loses publisher following school shooting comments

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Tesla is being investigated by US regulators for the dangerous potential of its Passenger Play feature.
As previously reported, Sega's Sonic the Hedgehog has been added to Tesla vehicles alongside other games, with the intention of providing entertainment to passengers. However, the feature is also accessible to drivers.
Read more
articles.title: Tesla investigated by US regulators for letting drivers play games

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
EA cancelled a Harry Potter MMO game as it didn't believe in the longevity of the IP.
Twitch streamer The Real Brandolorian interviewed Kim Salzer, who was EA's director of product marketing from 2000-2003.
Read more
articles.title: A Harry Potter MMO was "killed" by EA for lack of belief in the IP

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
FIFA 22 is the UK's Christmas number one this year, at least by physical sales.
EA's football game is followed by Among Us and Call of Duty: Vanguard, according to the latest sales report from GSD.
Read more
articles.title: FIFA 22 is the UK's Christmas number one

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
The PlayStation Store's Holiday Sale begins today with discounts on exclusive games.
The promotion will run until 19th January 2022, with more games set to be added on 5th January 2022.
Read more
articles.title: PlayStation Holiday Sale launches today

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Halo Infinite's holiday event Winter Contingency has launched, featuring various Christmas related rewards.
The free event runs until 4th January 2022 with ten rewards available.
Read more
articles.title: Halo Infinite's Winter Contingency event launches

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Ubisoft's NFT platform Quartz has been hit with a considerable backlash, especially as the numbers so far appear laughable.
Yet in an interview with Decrypt, Ubisoft's blockchain technical director Didier Genevois said the company will "stay true" to its principles.
Read more
articles.title: Ubisoft to continue with NFT platform Quartz despite criticism

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
A previously unreleased 2D intro cinematic for Sonic RPG Sonic Chronicles has surfaced online.
Released in 2008 for the Nintendo DS, Sonic Chronicles: Dark Brotherhood was an RPG developed by Bioware with turn-based combat.
Read more
articles.title: Unreleased hand drawn cinematic for Bioware's Sonic RPG surfaces online

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Twitch co-founder Justin Kan last week launched a new platform to sell NFTs, but its Discord server was hacked and hit by an NFT-selling scam.
Fractal is Kan's new venture, essentially a marketplace for selling in-game items and cosmetics as NFTs on the blockchain. 
Read more
articles.title: Twitch co-founder's new NFT platform hit with NFT scam through Discord hack

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
The Final Fantasy 6 pixel remaster now has a release date of February 2022.
Square Enix has been re-releasing its early games on mobile and Steam, with Final Fantasy 6 being the last installment in the collection.
Read more
articles.title: Final Fantasy 6 pixel remaster due February 2022

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
As the games industry reels from NFT backlash, a new mod has been created for Doom 2 that allows you to screenshot monkeys.
NFT Doom, a mod by Ultra.Boi, allows you to race through hell with demons replaced by those demonic apes from Bored Ape Yacht Club often sold as NFTs.
Read more
articles.title: Let off steam with this Doom NFT mod

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Intel chief Pat Gelsinger has reiterated the global chip shortage is set to continue into 2023.
That's despite manufacturers rushing to step up production to meet demand.
Read more
articles.title: Intel chief reiterates global chip shortage will continue into 2023

articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.description:
Staff are leaving Ubisoft in what's been dubbed "the great exodus".
As reported by Axios, there's been a wave of resignation from the company over the past 18 months at all levels of the business.
Read more
articles.title: Ubisoft staff leaving in "the great exodus"

articles.author: Ishraq Subhan
articles.description:
Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy - The Definitive Edition has received mixed reviews from the community and reviewers alike, thanks to a myriad of technical issues and contentious artistic choices. 
In response, Rockstar promised to make amends by giving PC owners the classic PC versions at no additional cost when purchased through the Rockstar Games Launcher. 
Read more
articles.title: PC owners of the GTA Trilogy remaster can claim an extra game for free

articles.author: Ishraq Subhan
articles.description:
Ubisoft's NFT platform, Quartz, caused quite a stir when it was announced at the beginning of the month.
The publisher revealed Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Breakpoint was to be the first game to offer NFTs in a beta trial in select countries not including the UK.
Read more
articles.title: Ubisoft appears to have sold a grand total of 15 NFTs

articles.author: Ishraq Subhan
articles.description:
It's been out for less than a week on PC, but modders have already started work on manipulating Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade. 
As you might expect, the mods range in quality from hilarious to crass. 
Read more
articles.title: PC gamers are already modding Final Fantasy 7 Remake

articles.author: Ishraq Subhan
articles.description:
The first season of Battlefield 2042 won't be released until March next year at the earliest. 
That's according to Battlefield dataminer temporyal, who reportedly found 12 weeks of pre-season weekly challenges in the game client.
Read more
articles.title: Battlefield 2042's first season reportedly won't be released until March 2022

articles.author: Ishraq Subhan
articles.description:
PlayStation Plus subscribers who previously redeemed a digital copy of Final Fantasy 7 Remake will be able to upgrade to the PlayStation 5 version from Wednesday at no extra cost. 
The enhanced version released in June and was a free upgrade for paid owners of the game, but not for players who scored their copy through PlayStation Plus.
Read more
articles.title: PS Plus owners of Final Fantasy 7 Remake get free PS5 upgrade this week

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
Resident Evil Village is reportedly our most-completed game of 2021.
According to the users on the site HowLongToBeat.com (thanks, Axios) - a user-led site that helps gamers see how long a game is before picking it up, even differentiating by main story, main plus extras, and completionist runs - of all the games that released in 2021 (and there was a lot of 'em), its users were mostly keen to see the conclusion of Resident Evil Village.
Read more
articles.title: Resident Evil Village is our most-completed game of 2021

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
Even Microsoft is struggling to get ahold of its own Xbox Series X consoles as the global shortages continue to affect the industry.
For Halo Infinite's first Halo Championship Series, the company has had to resort to using dev kits - that is, special consoles given to developers to test games during development - as it cannot source enough retail versions.
Read more
articles.title: Microsoft can't get hold of retail Xbox Series X consoles for this weekend's Halo tournament

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
A pamphlet given away at a Japanese retail store has revealed more details about the upcoming racer, Gran Turismo 7, including news it will include 420 different car models and over 90 racing tracks "with realistic weather and scenery".
As spotted by GT Planet, the free booklet distributed at Yodobashi Camera reminds us that the "long-awaited GT Mode" is back, in which "you can enjoy the car life" and "buying, selling, and tuning the cars and racing". 
Read more
articles.title: Gran Turismo 7 will include 420 car models and 90 tracks

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
Android 21 (Lab Coat) will soon join the fight in Dragon Ball FighterZ.
The unexpected news of a new DLC character was revealed during this weekend's Jump Festa 2022. You can see her in action in the new, and exceedingly brief, teaser below:
Read more
articles.title: Android 21 (Lab Coat) is coming to Dragon Ball FighterZ

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
If you were hoping that Little Devil Inside's delay to 2022 would see a release early next year, you may need to adjust your expectations. 
Although neither the development team nor Sony have formally confirmed the game's release date, a new video teaser on PlayStation's Instagram account has revealed Little Devil Inside will release in "Winter 2022", which is a little more specific than just 2022.
Read more
articles.title: Looks like Little Devil Inside will release towards the end of 2022

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
Hades is the very first video game to ever win a Hugo award, an annual literary award for the best science fiction or fantasy works of the year.
Though there's currently no best video game category, as per the World Science Fiction Convention, a one-off category was created for this year, and a permanent award is under consideration.
Read more
articles.title: Hades is the first video game to ever win the Hugo Award literary prize

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
Halo Infinite players have discovered a way to glitch into couch co-op.
While there's no officially sanctioned way to join a pal in Halo Infinite for its story campaign - right now, we have to wait to at least May 2022 before the functionality is rolled out - players have discovered a new exploit, albeit one with very limited features and the extraordinarily strong possibility you'll lose your progress to date.
Read more
articles.title: Here's how to glitch your way into Halo Infinite couch co-op

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
The second season of Netflix's The Witcher adaptation may have only just premiered yesterday, but the team behind the show has seemingly already completed the scripts for season 3.
That said, we're still a long way off from getting to see the third series, as the creative process is reportedly "now really just starting".
Read more
articles.title: Season 3 of Netflix's The Witcher script is already written

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
Knockout City's 4.0.2 patch is now live.
As well as the usual tweaks to gameplay and bugs, the patch also addresses issues that were introduced in Patch 4.0.
Read more
articles.title: Knockout City's new patch addresses the issues caused by the last patch

articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.description:
We knew it was coming, but now we know when - the new mini-console A500 Mini will release on 25th March, 2022.
Based on the Commodore Amiga 500 (also known as the A500), the Mini will be released on March 25, 2022.
Read more
articles.title: Here's the Amiga 500 Mini's release date and full details of its games library
